name: Popufaith
description:
In this populous inspired RTS, you are the god of the Blue Team and you are tasked with eliminating the Red Team. However, to do this you will have to test the faith of your followers who may disregard your orders and even betray you. Keep your followers educated but not too much or they'll start getting ideas.

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam with the theme "Out of Control." Being a god in command of a bunch of little guys who don't always do what you say seemed like a perfect example of this.
